DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study Inhaled R940343 Patients With Mild Moderate Asthma
DOC.detailed_description: The study multi-center , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel group study compare 2 dos inhaled R343 bid placebo 8 week patient mild moderate allergic asthma . Patients meet specific inclusion exclusion criterion initial screen evaluation single-blind , run-in period randomize receive either R343 placebo .
